sentences.sContent: Why don’t you tell us what really happened?
sentences.sCn: 你为什么不把真相告诉我们？
奥利弗其实不是她弟弟。

sentences.sContent: I never know what he’s really thinking.
sentences.sCn: 我从来都不知道他的真实想法。

sentences.sContent: She seems unfriendly at first, but she’s really very nice.
sentences.sCn: 一开始她似乎并不友善，但其实她人很好。

synos.tran: 实际上，事实上；真正地，真实地；真的吗？（表语气）

words.tran: [数] 可实现的；可实行的；可感觉到的
现实主义；实在论；现实主义的态度和行为
实现；认识到；了解；将某物卖得
实现（realize的过去式及过去分词）

trans.tranOther: used when you are talking about what actually happened or is true, rather than what people might wrongly think
